text: Muhammad bin Nayef Al Saud (Arabic: ) (born 30 August 1959) also known by his initials as MBN or MbN is a former Saudi Arabian politician and businessman. He had been crown prince, he became the first deputy prime minister of Saudi Arabia chosen by King Salman from 2015 to 2017. == Early life == Muhammad bin Nayef born in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia on 30 August 1959. He is one of the ten children of Nayef bin Abdulaziz. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:House of Saud Category:Prime Ministers of Saudi Arabia
title: Muhammad bin Nayef
